name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: A basic introduction to the fundamentals of computer science.

name: Discrete Mathematics
description: A course covering the basics of discrete mathematics such as logic, set theory, and graph theory.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: A course covering the basics of data structures and algorithms, including trees, sorting, and search algorithms.

name: Computer Organization and Architecture
description: A course covering the basics of computer organization and architecture, including memory, processors, and buses.

name: Advanced Computer Architecture
description: An advanced course covering more complex topics in computer architecture such as pipelining, cache systems, and virtual memory.
